dt: {bc}the act of transferring an entry or item from a book of original entry to the proper account in a ledger
{bc}the record in a ledger account resulting from the transfer of an entry or item from a book of original entry

dt.t: … he read verbatim from nasty Internet {wi}postings{/wi} about him and his family.

dt: {bc}to affix to a usual place (such as a wall) for public notices {bc}{sx|placard||}
{bc}to publish, announce, or advertise by or as if by use of a placard

to publish, announce, or advertise by or as if by use of a placard

dt: {bc}to assign to a unit, position, or location (as in the military or civil service)

shortdef: to station in a given place
to carry ceremoniously to a position
